page.title: 12Shopping
page.content: Although most villages have a small general shop and post office people have to travel to other towns for their main shopping. The main towns are Taunton, Street and Langport. There are not many shops at Burrowbridge that is why most people go to the larger towns. Taunton is the County Town of Somerset. Langport and Street are not as big as Taunton. Street is famous for shoes and sheeps- kin. Taunton is the best town to go to because it has many more shops of different sorts. On the outskirts of Taunton there is a huge Asda supermarket. It sells all kinds of food, clothes, china, garden furniture, electrical goods, magazines and stationery. It has its own free car park. People like this because it is difficult to park in the town.
